abstract: Bradley Edwin "Brad" Guzan /ˈɡuːzən/ (born September 9, 1984) is an American soccer player who plays as a goalkeeper for English Premier League club Aston Villa and the United States national team.
comment: Bradley Edwin "Brad" Guzan /ˈɡuːzən/ (born September 9, 1984) is an American soccer player who plays as a goalkeeper for English Premier League club Aston Villa and the United States national team.
